snippet: The Food and Drug Administration’s new labeling rules leave consumers safer, but not safe enough.
abstract: Editorial argues while new labeling rules announced by Food and Drug Administration will likely reduce fatal overdoses of prescription painkillers, they do not go nearly far enough in addressing skyrocketing abuse of Oxycontin and similar drugs.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration’s new labeling rules leave consumers safer, but not safe enough.

headline.main: A Step to Curb Painkiller Abuses
headline.print_headline: A Step to Curb Painkiller Abuses
